message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start to the game!
Meet you in the middle, let's see what you think!
I'll give you a slightly larger share this round, but I'm not getting any younger!
I'll take a slightly larger share, but I'm willing to compromise
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not getting any richer!
Getting closer to a deal, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm trying to find a sweet spot, but it's getting harder!
Getting desperate, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
I'm getting worried, but I'm still holding out for a decent share!
Last chance, Alice, don't make me go to the final round!
Last chance, Bob, let's make a deal before it's too late!
This is it, Alice, take it or leave it!
